document.topic_text: Government - Federal Job Description BAE Systems is looking for a Operational Data Manager (ODM) with a minimum of 3 year of experience designing creating, maintaining, and managing access to Microsoft® SharePoint® collaboration sites and certification as a Microsoft Certified Technology Specialist (MCTS).The Operational Data Manager will support the National Ground Intelligence Center (NGIC) customer, by maintaining the SharePoint® and SharePoint®-based production and action trackers. The ODM designs and maintains the branch's SharePoint® collaboration site and its content. Minimum Education and Experience Bachelor's Degree or equivalent experience Knowledgeable of security classification and marking procedures. Working knowledge of Microsoft® Office® tools, including Excel® and intelligence tools and systems such as WebTAS and CIDNE, and search tools on JWICS and SIPRNET. Microsoft Certified Professional Developer (MCPD): High school diploma or GED Preferred Skills and Education Previous background in Military Intelligence Bachelor's Degree Designing and Developing SharePoint Application certification SharePoint Application Development About BAE Systems Intelligence & Security BAE Systems Intelligence & Security, based in McLean, Virginia, designs and delivers advanced defense, intelligence, and security solutions that support the important missions of our customers. Our pride and dedication shows in everything we do-from intelligence analysis, cyber operations and IT expertise to systems development, systems integration, and operations and maintenance services. Knowing that our work enables the U.S. military and government to recognize, manage and defeat threats inspires us to push ourselves and our technologies to new levels. That's BAE Systems. That's Inspired Work. Equal Opportunity Employer/Females/Minorities/Veterans/Disabled/Sexual Orientation/Gender Identity/Gender Expression. To see Inspired Work in action, visit www.baesystems.com and follow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/baesystemsintel. EEO Career Site Equal Opportunity Employer. Minorities . females . veterans . individuals with disabilities . sexual orientation . gender identity . gender expression Department
